column4: hi , i want to install ubuntu on vmware but i cant load the disc the live cd with installation from my cd drive any help?
change the settings in vmware to use your disk drive, or create an iso and use the iso as disk drive
i boot it but i have problem the up and down button doesn`t work and i can select install ubuntu =D
you sure you have the vmware window selected? try clicking your mouse in it before using the keyboard
yea i have selected other buttons work like F4 and so on except the direction buttons
try booting the live cd and installing it from there
it has an icon install on the desktop
how to load the session with without select install ubuntu
when you start live cd, it automatically boots after 30 seconds
yeah thanks 6 gbs to allocate for /  is it ok?
depends on what you'll do with your ubuntu
better to have more space now, then to find out you haven't assigned enough ;)
